it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.tcp

Class TcpPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net.DataPacket
      • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.tcp.TcpPacket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Packet, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class TcpPacket
extends DataPacket
    Transmission Control Protocol (RFC 793) segment unit.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TcpPacket

        public TcpPacket(IpAddress src_addr,
                 int src_port,
                 IpAddress dst_addr,
                 int dst_port,
                 long sqn,
                 long ack,
                 byte[] data)
        Creates a new TCP segment.
        Parameters:
        src_addr - source address
        src_port - source port
        dst_addr - destination address
        dst_port - destination port
        sqn - sequence number
        ack - if ≥0, the ACK number
        data - the packet payload

      • TcpPacket

        public TcpPacket(IpAddress src_addr,
                 int src_port,
                 IpAddress dst_addr,
                 int dst_port,
                 long sqn,
                 long ack,
                 byte[] data_buf,
                 int data_off,
                 int data_len)
        Creates a new TCP segment.
        Parameters:
        src_addr - source address
        src_port - source port
        dst_addr - destination address
        dst_port - destination port
        sqn - sequence number
        ack - if ≥0, the ACK number
        data_buf - the buffer containing the packet payload
        data_off - the offset within the buffer
        data_len - the payload length

        dst_addr - IP destination address

        off - the offset within the buffer
        len - the length of the TCP packet
